General.Name: Panthera Resources PLC
General.Description: Panthera Resources PLC primarily engages in the exploration and development of gold projects in India and West Africa. Its flagship project is the Bhukia Project, a gold deposit located in the state of Rajasthan, India. The company was formerly known as IGL Resources PLC. The company was incorporated in 2017 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Salisbury House, London, United Kingdom, EC2M 5PS
